column4: I have an Intel 82852/82855 Graphics Media Accelerator  graphics card in my laptop. In Ubuntu 9.10, I can enable compiz. In 10.04, however, It is not stable till  I run it in safe graphics mode. Help?

I have an Intel 82852/82855 Graphics Media Accelerator  graphics card in my laptop. In Ubuntu 9.10, I can enable compiz. In 10.04, however, It is not stable till  I run it in safe graphics mode. Help?
i have an Intel N10 card in my EEE netbook - I can only use certain Compiz features without it crashing :(  Doesn't help I realize, but wanted you to know you aren't alone ;)  Best of luck man.
